body.raw:
The Methodology of this chart is the following:

- The chart shows the sentiment of the media coverage of the protest events in the selected time period. The sentiment is calculated by averaging the sentiment of all the articles that were mentioned in the protest event.

        - So this is the methodology of this chart:
          - The chart shows the sentiment of the media coverage of the protest events in the selected time period. The sentiment is calculated by averaging the sentiment of all the articles that were mentioned in the protest event.
